name: Bestiary
description:
BESTIARY is a game about frantically meticulously cataloguing strange creatures discovered in a new world.

The only information you have are the photographs sent to you by the scouts, but that's all you need, right professor?

Get to it!

---

BESTIARY presents you with a photo of a creature. Your job, as the resident expert, is to classify these creatures in as much detail as you can. When you're done, click Submit and your work will be saved as an image in the game's working directory. See README.TXT for further detail!

This was a small project I did for fun over the past week or so. It is absolutely free- but I'd appreciate a donation if you had fun and want to support my continuing efforts to make things :) No matter how small, it makes a difference!
